LanguageData.BiotechPatch_DeathrestAutoWake: Automatically enable auto-wake for deathresting pawns
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_MechsOutsideRadius: Allow moving mechs and ordering ranged attacks outside the mechanitor control radius
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_HemogenExtractionSpam: Disable message when extracting hemogen from hostile faction
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_ChildLaborEncouraged: Child labor: encouraged requires scheduled work
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_AllowForbiddenXenogermImpla: Allow xenogerm implantation via health tab for xenogerms that are forbidden
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_DrugDeficiencyAlert: Show alert for drug deficiency due to genes
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_LoadGrowthVats: Change text "growing" growth vats to "loading" growth vats
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_AutoChildNicknamesDisabled: Disable auto-nicknaming of children at growth moments
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_ChildrenGoByFirstName: Children are called by their first name by default
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_XenogermCreationForced: Prioritizing creating a xenogerm won't be interrupted at the worker's whimsy
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_GeneTraitsDontCancelIdentic: Same xenogene/endogene can both cancel each other out
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_GrowthMomentChoiceColors: Show colored trait/passion choices for growth moments based on utility
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_GrowthMomentTraitSuppressio: Traits selected at growth moment are unsuppressed by genes that should suppress them
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_CustomHybridXenotypes: Children of a custom xenotype and another custom xenotype or baseliner are labeled as baseliner
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_BreastfeedingCanBeInterrupt: Breastfeeding can be interrupted if the lactator has more important things to do
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_MoveBabyToSaferTempLater: Only move baby to safer temperature when it has temperature injury
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_MechsControlledByCaravan: Mechanitors in caravans can control their mechs back home (command range still applies)
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_MechsCanSleepOnConduits: Allow mechs to self-charge on top of power conduits and other non-chair standable buildings
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_WastepackDeteriorationMuted: Don't show message when wastepacks deteriorate in non-home area storage
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_ResurrectedMechsRememberGro: Dead mechs remember their control group after being resurrected
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_MechEnergyDepletedAlert: Make mechs with no energy more noticeable (alert + different icon)
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_MechTaskPrioritization: Allow right-clicking to prioritize tasks for mechs
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_WebbedPhalangesCanBeWet: Pawns with webbed phalanges don't care about being soaking wet
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_DrugDeficiencyAlertDesc: People are deficient in their life-sustaining drugs:\n{0}
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_AlertMechEnergyDepletedDesc: One or more of your colony mechanoids have completely depleted their energy and must be carried to a recharger.
